headline: Lauren Coward,  Michael Craig
abstract: The couple, who each graduated from Florida State University, met in September 2014 at the Royal, a bar in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: Lauren Catharine Coward and Michael Lawrence Craig were married Jan. 18 at 501 Union, an events space in Brooklyn. Pierce Kline, a friend of the couple who became a Universal Life minister for the occasion, officiated.
